name: Asana Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Asana events occur.
natural_language_description: 这是 Asana Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Asana events occur.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.description: The resource ID to subscribe to. The resource can be a task or project.
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 作用: The resource ID to subscribe to. The resource can be a task or project. | (必填项)

workspace.name: workspace
workspace.description: The workspace ID the resource is registered under. This is only required if you want to allow overriding existing webhooks. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
workspace.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workspace Name or ID | 作用: The workspace ID the resource is registered under. This is only required if you want to allow overriding existing webhooks. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
